title: Pornography, Divinity and Mercy
teaser:
A father of twin teenage boys finds the internet a scary place
for impressionable minds; a woman circles back to appreciate her strict
minister grandfather; and a man strives to grant forgiveness after a
devastating loss.  Hosted by The Moth's Artistic Director, Catherine Burns.

The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media
contentencoded:
Adam Savage tries to protect his sons from the perils of internet pornography.
 
Krista Tippet strays from her strict Lutheran grandfather's doctrines but finds a way back.

Hector Black must dig deep in his heart to forgive his daughter's murderer.
